author: Blender Guru
description:
Let's UV unwrap that coffee mug 🍩
New parts releasing every other day 🔜

In this video you'll learn how to UV unwrap a coffee mug, create coffee foam, and more.

===Links🔗===

Poliigon: https://www.poliigon.com/donut5
Poliigon addon: https://www.poliigon.com/blender
Join the Blender Guru Beginners Academy: https://academy.blenderguru.com/join

=== Chapter Marks ✂️===
0:00 Apply base texture
2:54 Separating handle island
5:35 UV unwrapping the rest of the mug
9:12 Creating straight lines
10:18 Installing the Mio3 UV extension
12:25 Gridify feature
13:38 Matching texel density
18:10 Workflow dependent UVs
20:09 Improving shader
21:48 Tweaking a color texture
25:02 Creating the coffee foam
33:05 Learn more UV unwrapping

title: Blender Basic UV Unwrapping Tutorial (Donut Part 6)
